downloadTitle: Configuring IP-DLC Link Service for IBM Enterprise Extender
downloadDescription: This white paper aids Mainframe Programmers, IBM i Administrators, and Microsoft Host Integration Server (HIS) specialists in configuring IP-DLC (Internet Protocol – Data Link Control) link service which ships with HIS 2020
detailsSection: This white paper aids Mainframe Programmers, IBM i Administrators, and Microsoft Host Integration Server (HIS) administrators in configuring IP-DLC (Internet Protocol – Data Link Control) link service which ships with HIS.  This document is also a reference for use with online documentation in diagnosing and troubleshooting connectivity and configuration issues with Host Integration Server.  IP-DLC is also known as IBM Enterprise Extender.
installInstructionSection:
1. Click the Download button to start the download.
  2. Do one of the following:
    • To start the installation immediately, click Open.
    • To copy the download to your computer for installation at a later time, click Save.
    • To cancel the installation, click Cancel.
